message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your 60-40 split seems unfair to me in the long run. How about we meet in the middle? This offer gets us the closest to an even split while accounting for the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than before. Take it before the money loses more value!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  This back and forth helps no one.
